column2: "There aren't that many extremely large Darkers out there. Destroying one will be a major blow to the enemy."
"But in the end, all of the Darkers will be exterminated, so it doesn't really matter how they're divided up."
"You seem to be more ambitious than the other ARKS I've met, so I thought this one would be perfect for you."
"Take it or leave it. No one is forcing you to do anything."
